conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>This is one of the few places that outsiders can witness the wonders of the Archives.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>...but too often it is muddied by the hands of the common folk.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>You've got a vest. At least you have some rank.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>There's nothing wrong with being an athlete.</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Well, it's a bit crude, that's all.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Enjoy my Archives. Try not to break anything.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I can't waste my time with people like you.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
